# Problem 11.26 - By Superposition {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

An overhanging beam is loaded as shown where L<sub>1</sub> = 7 ft, L<sub>2</sub> = 5 ft, and w = 200 kip/ft. Determine the deflection at the point C. Assume EI = 29,000 kip-ft<sup>2</sup>.
